items.title: Two retail stocks to buy as the holiday shopping season kicks off next week
items.description: Loop Capital says Best Buy and Five Below will stand strong in a cloudy U.S. economy.

items.title: Robinhood shares head for brutal weekly loss as bitcoin, AI stocks are hit hard
items.description: The platform's core business relies on retail investors pouring into speculative corners of the market, particularly crypto and AI-linked stocks.

items.title: Tech got crushed this week. This options trade generates income and can capture a rip back to record highs
items.description: Jeff Kilburg of KKM Financial breaks down this risk reversal options trade.

items.title: These are the chart levels to watch on Nvidia as chipmaker gets set to report earnings
items.description: What the Nvidia charts are showing, according to Frank Cappelleri of CappThesis.

items.title: Watch bitcoin over weekend to see if stock market will bounce next week, says Katie Stockton
items.description: The key to the stock market rebounding next week may lie on how well bitcoin performs over the weekend, according to technical analyst Katie Stockton.
